text: He imana rakhanaryanno! Tumacyapaiki jo koni apalya dina-dharmapasuna paravrtta ho'ila, tara sarvasrestha allaha lavakaraca asa janasamuhacya lokanna anila allaha jyancyasi prema rakhila ani tedekhila allahasi prema karata asatila. Imanadharakansathi te komalahrdayi asatila, parantu kaphiransathi matra kathora ani nirdayi asatila, te allahacya margata jihada karatila, kona ninda-nalasti karanaryancya aropaci parva karanara nahita. Hi allahaci krpa ahe, jyala icchito, pradana karato, allaha sarvasaktimana ahe ani atisaya jnana balaganara ahe
